The video was published on February 18: 2020, on a Facebook post that has been viewed more than 5,700 times.
The video shows Zhong Nanshan: a prominent scientist at China's National Health Commission, speaking with a hospital patient in Mandarin. Their conversation can be translated to English.
The video includes the logo for Douyin: the Chinese version of video-sharing app TikTok, in the bottom right-hand corner.
The claim is false: as the footage has been taken from a television program broadcast by Chinese state media channel CCTV in 2016, showing Zhong meeting with a different patient.
